offences.title: Public service vehicle - passenger use altered / defaced   ticket
offences.wording: On 10/08/2016 At threadneedle street EC2 Being a passenger on a Public service Vehicle operated on behalf of London Bus Services Limited being used for the carriage of passengers at separate fares where the vehicle was being operated by a Driver without a Conductor did not as directed by the Driver an Inspector or a Notice displayed on the vehicle pay the fare for the journey in accordance with the direction
